BundleIds.description: An array of strings that contains the identifiers of the bundles to retrieve. This parameter cannot be combined with any other filter parameter.

NextToken.description: The NextToken value from a previous call to this operation. Pass null if this is the first call.

Owner.description: The owner of the bundles to retrieve. This parameter cannot be combined with any other filter parameter. This contains one of the following values:   null- Retrieves the bundles that belong to the account making the call.    AMAZON- Retrieves the bundles that are provided by AWS.
